snippet: The fantasy author Neil Gaiman made the dreams of thousands of nerds come true last week.
abstract: Fantasy author Neil Gaiman announces a return to comic books for a new story starring his most popular creation, Morpheus, the Lord of Dreams, a k a the Sandman.
lead_paragraph: The fantasy author Neil Gaiman made the dreams of thousands of nerds come true last week.

headline.main: Neil Gaiman Plans Return to Comic Books
headline.print_headline: Neil Gaiman Plans Return to Comic Books
